1582869600.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
1582869600.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe. Live from London, tracking the breaking and top business news stories in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

1582873200.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
1582873200.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Open. Live from London, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582880400.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1582880400.descr: Bloomberg Surveillance. Live from London and New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

1582882200.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
1582882200.descr: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

1582884000.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
1582884000.descr: Bloomberg Surveillance. Live from London and New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

1582891200.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas
1582891200.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Americas. Live from New York, bringing viewers the latest in business and finance, providing unique global insights into where industry and markets are headed.

1582898400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
1582898400.descr: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

1582902000.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1582902000.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Americas. Live from New York, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582905600.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
1582905600.descr: Bloomberg Markets: European Close. Live from New York and London, analyzing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hear from the biggest newsmakers and showcase the unrivaled expertise of Bloomberg News.

1582909200.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power
1582909200.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power focuses on the politics and policies being shaped by the agenda of President Trump's administration.

1582912800.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
1582912800.descr: Bloomberg Real Yield focuses on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field. The show provides critical intelligence and analysis, allowing its audience to stay ahead of the competition.

1582914600.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
1582914600.descr: Bloomberg Markets: Americas. Live from New York, is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

1582916400.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
1582916400.descr: This fast-paced programme is the quintessential market close show leading up to the final minutes and seconds before the closing bell on Wall Street with the latest news, data and expert analysis.

1582923600.title: What'd You Miss?
1582923600.descr: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets program, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a counterintuitive, highly intelligent look at the markets that misses absolutely nothing.

1582927200.title: Bloomberg Technology
1582927200.descr: The only daily news program focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business from San Francisco.

1582930800.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1582930800.descr: Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

1582932600.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
1582932600.descr: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.

1582934400.title: Bloomberg Commodities Edge
1582934400.descr: Alix Steel talks to the top executives from the commodity world to discuss the biggest stories and trends in the market.

1582936200.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
1582936200.descr: Bloomberg Real Yield focuses on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field. The show provides critical intelligence and analysis, allowing its audience to stay ahead of the competition.

1582938000.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1582938000.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East live from Dubai, connects Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

1582941600.title: Bloomberg Money Undercover
1582941600.descr: Bloomberg Money Undercover looks at the world of private debt, equity and real estate. Lisa Abramowicz meets investors who are pouring money into the private market at an unprecedented level.

1582943400.title: Leaders with Lacqua
1582943400.descr: Kasper Rorsted, Adidas. Francine Lacqua interviews Kasper Rorsted, Chief Executive Officer of Adidas, about his career.

1582945200.title: Bloomberg Best
1582945200.descr: The week's top stories and best interviews from Bloomberg Television around the world anchored from New York, London, and Hong Kong.
